template.subject: Action Required: Reminder Pending Reviewer Task
template.body:
Dear %TARGET_FIRSTNAME% %TARGET_LASTNAME%,
An assessment is awaiting your review in MedTech Central. To proceed, please click the following link:
%URL%
As a refresher your username is %USERNAME%, and if you have any trouble remembering your password you can reset it by clicking the following link, and entering %EMAIL% as your e-mail address.
%ENTRADA_URL%/password_reset
If you have received this email on an earlier date, please be advised that the link to this assessment has been revised, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
If you have any questions or concerns please let us know, or for technical assistance please contact the Education Technology Unit at (613) 533-6000 x74294 or via e-mail at healthsci.support@queensu.ca.
Sincerely, %CREATOR_FIRSTNAME% %CREATOR_LASTNAME% %CREATOR_EMAIL%
